entry.summary: Google’s upcoming Gemini Pro 1.5 AI, which powers the free tier of its chatbot, can process 1.5 million tokens, a massive boost over the 128K that its rival and current version handles.

entry.title: Judge Dismisses Most Authors' Claims in AI Copyright Suit
entry.summary: While the case will still move forward, the federal court ruling is a setback for authors like Sarah Silverman, who were dinged for failing to provide sufficient evidence.
